Speaker: ﻿Narrator
Text: A pillar of light pierced the heavens, the product of rampant evil — the Evil Seed. No one could have predicted it would become a catalyst for catastrophe across the world... Our story takes place in the 16th century.

Speaker: Narrator
Text: A tragedy befell this place. Ling-Sheng Su Temple was a famous martial arts school in the far reaches of China, Ling-Sheng Su Temple was a famous martial arts school in the far reaches of China, Kilik ate and slept with the other students, and began his training at a young age, Despite this, he established a family-like bond with just one other student-Xianglian, a young girl who was like an elder sister to him. Dedicated to the way of the sword, she looked after Kilik as if they were siblings. So close was their bond that when one felt happy or sad, the other would feel the same. Together they studied and grew as warriors. Kilik’s skill earned him a place as a teacher-an honorable position for one so young. Throughout the ages, Ling-Sheng Su Temple had kept hold of the three sacred treasures: Krita-Yuga, Dvapara-Yuga, and Kali-Yuga. Kilik’s years of arduous training earned him the title of rightful bearer of the staff, Kali-Yuga Likewise, Xianglian was also designated bearer of Dvapara-Yuga, a sacred mirror. Our story begins on the night before the ritual for passing the treasures on to their new masters…

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianglian... Can I ask you something?

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: Sure.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: How come you were chosen to bear Dvapara-Yuga?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I thought you’d get Krita-Yuga. After all, you’ve dedicated your life to the sword.

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: ...Kilik, this is not easy for me to talk about. The Krita-Yuga... it’s no longer at Ling-Sheng Su. The sword has been gone for more than a decade. All that’s left is the Kali-Yuga and the Dwapara-Yuga.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Really…?

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: Surprised? Well, there’s more. The one who stole the Krita-Yuga was none other than... my father. That’s why I don’t have the right to bear it. That’s why even though it was offered to me, I decided to decline. Of course. I love Ling-Sheng Su... and I do wish to see my studies through to their conclusion. It’s just… I... I just don’t want the sacred treasures or my status as a sacred bearer... or anything else to hold me back. You know what the monks say.

Speaker: Kilik & Xianglian
Text: “Fate is carved with your own hands.”

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: When I spoke to them about that, they decided to let me bear Dvapara-Yuga instead. Now I can feel proud that I’m a sacred bearer, just like you. Um, you know something, Kilik...?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What?

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: It’s okay. Never mind... I’m really looking forward to tomorrow.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Me, too...

Speaker: Narrator
Text: And so it was Kilik and Xianglian were set to attend the official ritual for becoming sacred bearers. But the night before the ritual, a terrible calamity plunged everything into chaos. Drawn by the Kali-Yuga in Kilik’s hand, the Evil Seed came to Ling-Sheng Su Temple. The monks, driven insane by the evil force, began slaying each other, turning the temple into hell on Earth…

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Haah, hah, hah… What have... I done? Ngh! Ungh!

Speaker: Monk
Text: Hyah! Hyaaah!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I don’t understand. Everyone... stop this madness... Krgh! Ngh! It’s kill... or be killed...! Huh?! Xia— ...Xianglian...?

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: Hrrragh!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Get a hold of yourself, Xianglian!

Speaker: Xianglian
Text: Teiyah! Yyaaah!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianglian... Ngh!
[He accidentally kills her.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xiang—...lian...? Aaaaaaaaaagh!!!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ungh... Where... am I...?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Did you save me? Who are y— Ngh!

Speaker: Mysterious Old Man
Text: You have yet to recover from your injuries. Rest. And that mirror-- Dvapara-Yuga. Wear it always. There will be grave consequences if you do not. Understand?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Uh…
[He remembers something from the attack.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: *sigh* Oh, Xianglian... *weeping quietly* So... the power of Dvapara-Yuga saved me. That means... Xianglian... she gave it to me. She sacrificed her life for me. And then I... I... with my bare hands… Why? Tell me, Xianglian! Why am I still alive?!

Speaker: Mysterious Old Man
Text: Have you not realized yet? You are being protected. Dvapara-Yuga suppresses the evil within you.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Evil?

Speaker: Narrator
Text: The old man proceeded to tell a tale. He told Kilik about the Evil Seed… How Dvapara-Yuga had pulled Kilik back from the brink of insanity... How Kali-Yuga had the ability to absorb power and how it was falling under an evil spell... And finally, he told Kilik about Soul Edge.

Speaker: Mysterious Old Man
Text: Your fate will be set in stone the moment you lose your will to live. Your soul will be swallowed whole by your destiny, leaving behind but a rotten corpse. That is but one path you may take. But, perhaps, it is the path you wish to take. To submit to that evil sword and its wicked power? Is that what you wish? To become a thrall? Do you see...? All is in your hands.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianglian... she told me… “Fate is carved with your own hands.” Xianglian gave her life so I could live. That leaves me only one choice.

Speaker: Narrator
Text: From that day forth, Kilik bore the heavy weight of his karma. As Xianglian’s slayer, and the last living member of Ling-Sheng Su, he chose to face his cruel fate head on.

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: If you continue upon this path, the evil within you will create a second Soul Edge out of Kali-Yuga. The only reason you and Kali-Yuga have yet to succumb is because of Dvapara-Yuga’s power. However, all is not lost. You can learn to control the evil within.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes... Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Is that it? If this tests you so dearly, how do you intend to stand up to evil?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh... Sorry, Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: To control evil, you must first control yourself. Mastering your own will is the key to overcoming malice.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes, Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: The enemy is powerful. You must stand strong, whoever your opponent!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Um... Yes, Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Hmph... Kilik, your next opponent awaits.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Who...?

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Sometimes things reveal themselves when you fight.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I understand, Master.

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: So... did you learn something?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes. I believe I felt how delicate the balance is between myself and evil.

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: I see... Then the time has almost come.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Master...?

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: It is nothing. What are you doing? You have yet to finish your training for the day.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Y-Yes, Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Kilik... You have borne the burden of your training well.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes, Master

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Now we shall see how you fare against me.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: An actual fight with you? It would be an honor!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Why do you hold back? Come at me!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes, Master! Yah!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Seiii! You have improved. I understand why you were chosen to bear Kali-Yuga.
[Kilik recall the night he kills Xianglian.]

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Kilik, a shadow lies upon your soul. Take heed! If it envelops you completely, the evil within you will stir... and in time tear at your soul until there is nothing left. You need to banish that shadow. I have shown you how to control evil. The rest is up to you.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes, Master...

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Kilik, this will be your final test. You must seal away Soul Edge, the cause of all this madness, and cleanse yourself of evil.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes, Master!

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: Head west. Keep going to where the wielder of Soul Edge awaits in the heart of a great maelstrom. You must live on, as have I.
[Kilik’s riding in a wagon with some pirate.]

Speaker: Pirate
Text: So, ya wants to head West, do’s ya? Guess нer in luck, 'cause that’s where we’re goin’. But I warns ya, our ship ain’t whatcha call luxurious.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I don’t care, as long as you’re heading West. So, can I join you?

Speaker: Pirate
Text: Sure, why not? But it could end up costin’ ya a pretty penny, heh heh. Huh? Oi, driver! Where’s ya goin’? This ain’t the way to the dock!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Huh?

Speaker: Pirate
Text: You deaf or summin?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What the...?!
[The driver appears to be… um… zombie?]

Speaker: Driver
Text: Screeeeech!!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: He’s been consumed by evil!

Speaker: Driver
Text: I’ll kill you!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Damn... You leave me no choice!

Speaker: Pirate
Text: Phew, ya saved me. Even us pirates ain’t safe from bandits when we’s on land. Thanks, matey!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Sure.  That was no ordinary bandit. It takes me back to that night. The shadow upon my soul... Xianglian... Am I strong enough...?

Speaker: Kyam
Text: So yer the guy who saved one of our own? On behalf o’ our captain, Maxi, I welcome ya aboard. But... I’m gonna have to take that mirror from ya till we hit land. Sound reasonable?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: This is one thing I can’t give you.

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Why not? We’re just gonna hold on to it. It ain’t like it’s payment for yer ride or nothin’.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: This is a keepsake from my sister.

Speaker: Kyam
Text: A keepsake, eh?  Y’know... I dunno what I’da done, if it weren’t for Maxi.  Heh... Kay, fine. I like ya. I’ll go speak to Maxi for ya. Yer one o’ us now.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Thank you...!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Don’t mention it. [Kilik and Kyam have a friendly chat]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: It seems the captain has the trust of his crew.

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Heh, you’ll see why once ya meet ’im. He ain’t been back since he stepped on land. Prolly got stuck at the bottom o’ a glass. Hm? What the...?!
[Some monsters attack them.]

Speaker: Deck Hand
Text: What?!

Speaker: Flustered Crew Member
Text: Aaagh!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Who d’ya think ya are?! Ya got some nerve thinkin’ ya can pick a fight with one o’ us! Hey... Kilik, right? You’re a passenger, so stand back!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: No, I want to join in.

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Heh... In that case, welcome to the crew! It’s show time! It never ends!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: I don’t understand. Why will you not relinquish your ego and let the evil consume you?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Who the hell are you?!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Is it because of that mirror? You fool! Remember the massacre you caused?! You let yourself run wild! I shall destroy the mirror and free you from its shackles!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Hrngh!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Look out, Kilik!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Kyam!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Who is this abomination?! How dare he harm my family! Have at you!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Maxi…

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Kyam! This is bad...

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Hrnnn!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Careful o’ that ax, brother…

Speaker: Maxi
Text: That son of a—! He’ll pay for this... He WILL pay!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Who the hell are you?! Hmph, no matter. You’re just another sacrifice! He still needs strong souls to increase his strength! Fall back!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Stop right there! What?!
[Kilik transforms into his “evil” form.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngroooaagggh!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: What’s with this guy?! We gotta fight him, too?!

Speaker: Kyam
Text: He… he’s one of us…

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Okay, so I won’t kill him... Just save your strength. Damn. Got my work cut out for me. If the mirror doesn’t work, the only option I’ve got is to kill him! You... can thank... Kyam. Adios, Kyam... everyone...

Speaker: Kyam
Text: Take... Take Kilik west...

Speaker: Maxi
Text: I know, Kyam... I know... It’s like you said, he’s one of us. I ain’t leaving him behind. And y’know... Those guys’ll be back for ‘im. We will get our revenge! It’s the only reason I live for now.

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: You... Are you that nunchaku wielder who wants me dead?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Maxi...?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: I have no idea what you’re talking about... Even so, what’s the deal?!

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: What? I thought all warriors knew you have to strike first.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Hold on a sec!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Looks like we’re done talkin’! I may look easygoing... but I never back down from a challenge!

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: Ha, you’re sure one plucky fellow! I will honor you with a duel!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Heh. Don’t blame me if you get hurt. Wait. What do you mean you got the wrong person!

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: Hahaha! I’m sorry. I am Mitsurugi. So many people want me dead, it’s hard to keep track.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Seriously? You may wanna rethink your life choices.

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: Well, if you seek Soul Edge, the most powerful weapon ever, you’re bound to attract trouble, right?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Soul Edge?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: We’ve got our own beef with that.

Speaker: Mitsurugi
Text: Well, this is quite a coincidence. Let me just give you this word of advice. Beware of the ninja Taki. Soul Edge and her go hand in hand. So long!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: The hell was up with that guy?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: No idea.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: He put up a good fight, I’ll give him that. Is everyone that’s looking for Soul Edge like him?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Just try not to overdo it, okay, Maxi?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Haha! You worry too much! If anything, you’re the one we need to keep an eye on.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Hyah! Tah! Yah!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Is that...? Is that the Ling-Sheng Su style sword technique? Xianglian…?

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Why’s he staring?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: They could be twins...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: …? Ling-Sheng Su? I’ve heard of it... My mother might’ve trained there when she was younger... She taught me how to use a sword. Admit it, you’re impressed.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yeah, I am. You move very... um... gracefully.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Heehee! Thank you! Are you traveling somewhere?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yeah. I’m heading west.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Really?! Me, too! What are you doing around here?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I just... y’know... happened to be passing through.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: I see... It must be fate!
[He recalls the night he kills Xianglian.]

Speaker: Edge Master
Text: (in Kilik’s head) A shadow lies upon your soul.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: So I’m Xianghua! And you are?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Hey, Kilik! You found someone you wanna bring along? Hahaha! I can’t take my eye off you for five seconds, can I?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: No, it’s not —

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: We’re going in the same direction. The more the merrier! Thanks, Kilik.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I… um… okay…

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Nightmare? So he’s the wielder of Soul Edge?

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: If my investigations are correct, yes.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Kind of over-the-top name, isn’t it?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Okay, lees go over everything. They’re banding together. And their leader is Nightmare. He’s friends with the jerk I’m after — a real piece of work called Astaroth. Then there’s that lizard freak... and a woman called Ivy, who uses a whip-sword. That’s one hell of a crew.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: We could end up facing a whole army. Nightmares are like phantoms. Wherever they appear, they slaughter everyone in sight. They’re monsters.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: What do they want?

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: ...Who knows?

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Kilik, doesn’t your master know anything about all this?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I don’t know...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Well, that’s just great.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Still... Whatever we do, I think our paths will cross at some point.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Yeah, at some point.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Great…

Speaker: Grøh
Text: Hmph.

Speaker: Liaison
Text: The order stands as it was.

Speaker: Grøh
Text: Understood. I will make contact shortly.
[Kilik attacks him.]

Speaker: Grøh
Text: Show me what you’ve got!
[He split his staff into two swords.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What?!

Speaker: Grøh
Text: If this is all you have... Then your fate is to die here.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Who are you?!

Speaker: Grøh
Text: I have no reason to answer that.
[Kilik defeat him.]

Speaker: Grøh
Text: So it seems my information was sound. I will tell you one thing. Nightmare has established a base in an abandoned castle called Ostrheinsburg. Head there if you seek Soul Edge.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What? Who the hell are you?!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Kilik, are you okay?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Y-Yes, fine.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Tell me, Kilik... Who exactly are you? People seem out to get you.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I apologize for getting you involved in all this...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Stop acting so formal! Fine, I’ll open up first. I’ve been hiding something from you. I’m searching for Soul Edge, too.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Really…?

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: My country, the Ming Empire... you know it, right? It’s going through some hard times. Violence is the norm. In the hope of saving our land, the emperor asked me directly to search for the Hero’s Sword… Also known as Soul Edge. So, that’s what I’m trying to do. I may not look like one, but I’m a soldier.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Surprised? Well, it means I’ve been involved in this from the start. Phew... You’re the first person I’ve told. It was supposed to be an imperial secret. Does that affect things between us?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yeah, I guess so... Sorry. I knew some time ago I would have to tell you everything. So I’ll just say it. Soul Edge is evil. It isn’t going to save your empire.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Okay... If you say so, it must be true. I thought it was a little strange. How could that so-called Hero’s Sword save our land? Okay, that settles it! I’m going to stick with you, Kilik!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What? But...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: My duty is important to me... but I want to know the truth. I want to see it for myself!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Okay, when this journey’s over, escort me back to my land. With Maxi, too, of course. No ifs, ands, or buts!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What have I gotten myself into? I guess it’s fate...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Don’t you worry about that. I know fate has plunged you into misfortune... but my mother always said... “Fate is carved with your own hands.”

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Um, I’m kidding?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Oh, right... Never mind then.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Um...

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Y-Yes? Is something the matter?

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Um... no… It’s just, you look a little sad.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Oh… Really?

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Pardon me, but a re you a traveler?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Well… um… Yo could say that.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: I am, too. I mean, I am from this town. I came to this shrine to pray before embarking on my journey. You... you’re a warrior, aren’t you?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Yes...

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: I was, too. I fought for the longest time... It is why I can never simply pass by someone with as forlorn a countenance as yours.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: There’s something I must do.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: When you find a reason to fight, you find a reason to punish yourself. I was the same.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: There are some things we are powerless to do anything about.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: People speak of fate, but I wonder if there is worth in sacrificing yourself for it.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I feel so uncertain.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: The darkness of the soul can be troubling.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: It’s always with me, like a real shadow, dark and unshakable.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Yet, all is not lost.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: I can’t just forget the past in order to save myself.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: It is no bad thing to keep hold of the past. Those dear to you will always be in your memories. Still... the past is the past. If you ask me... there are those you need to protect in the here and now. So, you should wear a more fitting expression.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Um, okay.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Listen to me babbling on. Haha.

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: I have to go. Hn!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Are you okay?

Speaker: Sophitia
Text: Yes... Pain does indeed lie in the past. I shall pray for your safety.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: As will I.
[She leaves.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Those I need to protect in the here and now...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Are you sure this is the right way?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: It should be.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: I can’t believe we got separated from Maxi... Dammit....

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Look out! Hng!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Wh-What the...?!
[Something hits Kilik… A shuriken?]

Speaker: Taki
Text: So you made it this far.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Huh?! Why...? Guhh!

Speaker: Taki
Text: Is that all it takes to hobble you? If so, do you honestly think you can take on Soul Edge? You’re a fool.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh...!

Speaker: Taki
Text: No human can bear that power. I’ll stop you here and now before you make contact with the cursed sword!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: H-Hold on! I won’t let you touch Kilik!

Speaker: Taki
Text: Oh really? Why do you interfere? You never had anything to do with the sword before. For your own sake, stay out of this.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: I didn’t choose to get involved! But now, I’m choosing not to back down!

Speaker: Taki
Text: Huh...? There’s something strange about that sword. How do you like this?!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Whoa!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Haah!

Speaker: Taki
Text: What?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: What’s wrong...? Had enough?

Speaker: Taki
Text: Heh. So you controlled the evil yourself. Fair enough. Just take care. Soul Edge is more powerful than ever before. The instant you give yourself over to your shadow, I’ll kill you. You’ve been warned! There’s no escape from a ninja with the power to seal!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh… Guh…

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Are you okay, Kilik?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Y-yeah… I knew pursuing Soul Edge... would be no easy task, but...

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Kilik
Text: Once we get through this forest…

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Maxi
Text: Yup, it’s the date we’ve all been waiting for. Who knows? Might go well.

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Xianghua
Text: I just don’t wanna deal with any more freaks. One lizard’s enough for me,

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Kilik
Text: Huh?!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Gah!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Maxi
Text: Speak of the devil!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Kilik
Text: Maxi! Don’t do anything rash!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Ivy
Text: Hmph.

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Maxi
Text: Are you okay?

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Ivy
Text: I’d say that was enough. I have fulfilled my duty. If you want to pursue Nightmare, I don’t care. Do as you please.

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Hey! Hold on!

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua, you can’t go on with your leg like that.

Chapter: — The Lady with the Strange Sword —
Speaker: Maxi
Text: We’re almost to the castle.

Speaker: Maxi
Text: A damn trap... Well isn’t this just peachy?!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: *strained breathing*

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Gweh heh heh... So the reports were true. What sort of idiots try to enter a castle through the front?!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Leave him to me. I’ve been looking forward to smacking down this freak!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Hmph... So you came here to die?! What’s this?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Are you here to help us?

Speaker: Grøh
Text: This way! Hurry!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Um, but what about Maxi?!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: I’m fine. Just go!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Impudent fools! You cannot escape me! Gwaaagh!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: I’m your problem right now.  Is it... over...?

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Doryaaah!

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Gwoof! Talk about a poor loser! Нrrtah!

Speaker: Astaroth
Text: Gwaaaaaaargh!
[Asteroth’s defeated.]

Speaker: Maxi
Text: Everyone... Kyam... this was for you...  Gurhurgh...!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: *gasping*

Speaker: Grøh
Text: Get a hold of yourselves.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Her leg.

Speaker: Grøh
Text: If you cannot fight, you will be left behind.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: I’m fine! Don’t underestimate me!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Where are we?

Speaker: Grøh
Text: Sorry, but I have to attend to my mission now. The rest is up to you.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Th-Thank you.
[Grøh leaves.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua, you should stay here.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Never! I can’t turn away now after all we’ve been through! Let’s do this.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: ...Okay.
[They enter the castle, walking carefully and constantly looking around. In the middle of the room, they meet a knight in heavy dark armor, Nightmare.]

Speaker: Nightmare
Text: Fate... has chosen you. Why do you resist?

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Because… that is what it means to be human! I’ll carve... my own fate!
[They fight and Kilik manages to gain the upper hand over one of the most nightmarish enemies of the universe.]
[The victory costs Kilik a high price.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Nnghh!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Are you okay, Kilik?!
[Unexpectedly Nightmare begins to transform...]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh...!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: What?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Look out!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Aaagh!
[A Chinese sword comes down from the sky. Xianghua takes it.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Mother... I... am ready!
[She's defeating the demon.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Is it over yet?!
[The demon is not dead yet.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Stubborn son of a— Agh!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua!
[The demon attacks Xianghua, but Kilik covers her with his body.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Unh... K-Kilik?!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: It’s okay. Xianglian... give me strength!
[Kilik is transforming into his own... uh... super saiyan form and defeats the demon.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua!
[She runs up and breaks the demon's sword.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Rngh!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Aaaagh! Is it... protecting me? B-But…!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Ngh...!
[The sword sucks into the rift between the worlds.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Agh! The sword!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: No! It's too dangerous!

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Nngrraaaaah!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Nnghh!
[There comes peace in the world.]

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianglian…

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Dvapara-Yuga... What a waste.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: It's fine.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: *sigh* Kilik, hold out your hand.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: …? This is…
[He's got a green crystal in his hand.]

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Hee hee! I just couldn’t resist!

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Xianghua... could you hold on to it for me?

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: What? But...

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Please.

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Okay...

Speaker: Xianghua
Text: Thanks. I’ll keep it safe.

Speaker: Kilik
Text: Great!

Speaker: Narrator
Text: The swords once again left their mark on history and still the march of fate continues onward…
[Credits]

Speaker: Narrator
Text: The legend will never die.
